title: (x) Sky Burial script - Sallando Italic {Mike Y}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013113909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sky.jpg)
  
Can someone help me idnetify this thypeface?
author: hera

comments.content:
That's Sallando Italic, by Philip Bouwsma. You can get it at Fonts.com

- Mike Yanega

Here is a link to [Sallando Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013113909/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=203309)..

- Mike Yanega
